tool.name: Validate
tool.help:
**Description**
.. image:: http://www.cellorganizer.org/galaxy/images/sbml_logo.png
| | Validates an SBML_ Level 3 instance using the public SBML online _validator.
-----
**Input**
* An SBML Level 3 instance (XML file)
-----
**Options**
* No options are needed
-----
**Output**
* If the validator returns true, then this tool reports the file as a valid instance. False, otherwise.
.. _SBML: http://sbml.org/Documents/Specifications/SBML_Level_3 .. _validator: http://sbml.org/Facilities/Validator/
